# stop

Stop a workspace

## Usage

```console
coder stop [flags] <workspace>
```

## Options

### -y, --yes

|      |                   |
| ---- | ----------------- |
| Type | <code>bool</code> |

Bypass prompts.

### --debug-provisioner

|      |                   |
| ---- | ----------------- |
| Type | <code>bool</code> |

Sets the provisioner log level to debug.<br/>This will print additional information about the build process.<br/>This is useful for troubleshooting build issues.
